short_summary: Informatics Professionals on an as-needed basis to support its Information Management Systems.
description: The department of Canadian Heritage (PCH) will require Informatics Professionals on an as-needed basis to support its Information Management Systems.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
================================
### Service Information

The Canadian Heritage department invites tenders for the provision of Informatics Professionals on an as-needed basis to support their Information Management Systems.

### Solicitation Details

| **Feature** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | `cb-492-23118050` |
| **Amendment Number** | 3 |
| **Solicitation Number** | `10232494` |
| **Publication Date** | 2024-02-29 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2024-03-19 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | 2024-04-01 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | 2026-03-31 |
| **Tender Status** | Expired |

### Procurement Details

* **Trade Agreements**: 
	+ The contract is open to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).
* **Procurement Category**: SRV - Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Evaluation Criteria**: The contract will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Reminders

* The tender closing date has been changed to March 19, 2024, with two amendment communications:
	+ Amendment 001: A mistake in the solicitation end date on Canada Buys (which was corrected on February 28, 2024), with a new end date of March 14, 2024, for the first amendment which got corrected and new end date is March 19, 2024
	+ Amendment 002: The solicitation end date has been changed back to March 19, 2024.

### Important Documents

* [English Document 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33202/10232494-npp-english-amend001.pdf)
* [English Document 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33202/10232494-npp-english-amend002.pdf)
*
